obo.description:
The OBO Context exists for the following reasons:

- Reconciling "database cross-references" used by OBO ontologies and centralising their validation.
- Standardising and validating SSSOM mappings provided in the context of OBO ontologies.
- Providing an incentive for the documentation of non-standard prefixes for OBO ontologies.
obo.name: Open Biomedical Ontologies Context
